item.title: About
item.description: What is this? It’s a blog where you will find content regarding whatever is inspiring me at the time. But it’ll probably be about video gaming, Linux, or philosophy. Who am I? My name is Keenan Weaver. I live in the Midwest in the United States. I’ve been on the internet for an unhealthily long time and have been in a lot of different gaming communities. What I’m probably most famous for is running Echo Sector, a fansite for the Crusader game series, which has been going since 2005.
